title: Oppo Find X8 Mini might be launching alongside the Find X8 Ultra
description: Oppo has unveiled the Find X8 and Find X8 Pro earlier this month, and the Find X8 Ultra is expected to join them in a few months' time. But now it turns out there could actually be a fourth member of the family coming alongside the Ultra. This is speculated to be a Find X8 Mini by Chinese Weibo user Digital Chat Station. If this is true, then Oppo will have a product to rival vivo's recently launched X200 Pro mini, a device that seems tailor-made to compete head-on with Apple's smaller iPhone 16 Pro. excerpt: It would compete with the vivo X200 Pro mini and the iPhone 16 Pro. Oppo has unveiled the Find X8 and Find X8 Pro earlier this month, and the Find X8 Ultra...
text: Oppo has unveiled the Find X8 and Find X8 Pro earlier this month, and the Find X8 Ultra is expected to join them in a few months' time. But now it turns out there could actually be a fourth member of the family coming alongside the Ultra. This is speculated to be a Find X8 Mini by Chinese Weibo user Digital Chat Station. If this is true, then Oppo will have a product to rival vivo's recently launched X200 Pro mini, a device that seems tailor-made to compete head-on with Apple's smaller iPhone 16 Pro. Oppo Find X8Thus, Oppo would also join this fight, with a handset boasting a smaller screen but flagship specs - just like the iPhone 16 Pro and vivo X200 Pro mini. Do however take all of this with a grain of salt for now, as it seems to be just an educated guess and nothing more. We're sure that if the Oppo Find X8 Mini does exist and is coming alongside the Ultra, we'll be hearing a lot more about it in the next few weeks. Source (in Chinese)
html:
Oppo has unveiled the Find X8 and Find X8 Pro earlier this month, and the Find X8 Ultra is expected to join them in a few months' time. But now it turns out there could actually be a fourth member of the family coming alongside the Ultra.

This is speculated to be a Find X8 Mini by Chinese Weibo user Digital Chat Station. If this is true, then Oppo will have a product to rival vivo's recently launched X200 Pro mini, a device that seems tailor-made to compete head-on with Apple's smaller iPhone 16 Pro.

Oppo Find X8

Thus, Oppo would also join this fight, with a handset boasting a smaller screen but flagship specs - just like the iPhone 16 Pro and vivo X200 Pro mini. Do however take all of this with a grain of salt for now, as it seems to be just an educated guess and nothing more. We're sure that if the Oppo Find X8 Mini does exist and is coming alongside the Ultra, we'll be hearing a lot more about it in the next few weeks.

Source (in Chinese)
